name: Aerial Modification
oracle_text: Enchant creature or Vehicle
As long as enchanted permanent is a Vehicle, it's a creature in addition to its other types.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.

name: Aeronaut Admiral
oracle_text: Flying
Vehicles you control have flying.
flavor_text: The Consulate recruits its best pilots from the League of Aeronauts. Many go on to command entire fleets.

name: Aether Inspector
oracle_text: Vigilance
When Aether Inspector enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
Whenever Aether Inspector attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

name: Aethergeode Miner
oracle_text: Whenever Aethergeode Miner attacks, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
Pay {E}{E}: Exile Aethergeode Miner, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
flavor_text: Gremlins in the wild feed on nodules of pure aether, which are also prized by miners.

name: Airdrop Aeronauts
oracle_text: Flying
Revolt — When Airdrop Aeronauts enters the battlefield, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, you gain 5 life.
flavor_text: "Supplies inbound. Keep that pressure on."

name: Alley Evasion
oracle_text: Choose one —
• Target creature you control gets +1/+2 until end of turn.
• Return target creature you control to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: "Sure, you know the law. But I know the streets."

name: Audacious Infiltrator
oracle_text: Audacious Infiltrator can't be blocked by artifact creatures.
flavor_text: "This little critter can turn all of you to scrap in under thirty seconds! Come on, who wants to be the first to go? Try and stop me!"

name: Bastion Enforcer
flavor_text: Headquartered at the Bastion of the Honorable, the Consulate's enforcers are charged with the impossible task of keeping the peace.

name: Call for Unity
oracle_text: Revolt — At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, put a unity counter on Call for Unity.
Creatures you control get +1/+1 for each unity counter on Call for Unity.
flavor_text: The "leaking spire" stands for liberation from Consulate control.

name: Caught in the Brights
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
When a Vehicle you control attacks, exile enchanted creature.
flavor_text: While hunting aether, a gremlin may ignore other stimuli, including threats to its own life.

name: Consulate Crackdown
oracle_text: When Consulate Crackdown enters the battlefield, exile all artifacts your opponents control until Consulate Crackdown leaves the battlefield.
flavor_text:
"The workshops are silent. Our creations have been seized. They have killed what made us alive."
—Pia Nalaar

name: Conviction
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+3.
{W}: Return Conviction to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: "There is no greater coward than one who believes in nothing."

name: Countless Gears Renegade
oracle_text: Revolt — When Countless Gears Renegade enters the battlefield, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.
flavor_text: "Go forth and cause trouble, my little one!"

name: Dawnfeather Eagle
oracle_text: Flying
When Dawnfeather Eagle enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"It came to rest upon the angel's arm, and then the weight of their gazes fell upon me."
—Aeronaut's journal

name: Deadeye Harpooner
oracle_text: Revolt — When Deadeye Harpooner enters the battlefield, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, destroy target tapped creature an opponent controls.
flavor_text: "It seems there's even better hunting down here."

name: Decommission
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
Revolt — If a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, you gain 3 life.
flavor_text: "A key weakness in the design is its vulnerability to repeated, forceful blows."

name: Deft Dismissal
oracle_text: Deft Dismissal deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target attacking or blocking creatures.
flavor_text:
"With spy thopters all around, how can the consuls be so blind to Tezzeret's manipulations?"
—Gideon Jura

name: Exquisite Archangel
oracle_text: Flying
If you would lose the game, instead exile Exquisite Archangel and your life total becomes equal to your starting life total.
flavor_text: A living invention born of a grand design.

name: Felidar Guardian
oracle_text: When Felidar Guardian enters the battlefield, you may exile another target permanent you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
flavor_text: The loyalty of a felidar is hard won but worth the effort.

name: Ghirapur Osprey
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Many airship captains keep pets that share their love of the sky.

name: Restoration Specialist
oracle_text: {W}, Sacrifice Restoration Specialist: Return up to one target artifact card and up to one target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Dwarves' tools are priceless heirlooms handed down through generations.

name: Solemn Recruit
oracle_text: Double strike
Revolt — At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Solemn Recruit.
flavor_text: "I can no longer sit in my workshop and ignore the events outside. My hammers strike for the people of Ghirapur."

name: Sram, Senior Edificer
oracle_text: Whenever you cast an Aura, Equipment, or Vehicle spell, draw a card.
flavor_text: "As this conflict grows, it gets harder to prevent the city from breaking down. How much longer can we keep this machinery balanced?"

name: Sram's Expertise
oracle_text: Create three 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens.
You may cast a card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.
flavor_text: "It's important to always have the right tool for the job. This one is for picking my teeth."

name: Thopter Arrest
oracle_text: When Thopter Arrest enters the battlefield, exile target artifact or creature an opponent controls until Thopter Arrest leaves the battlefield.
flavor_text: The Consulate's eyes—unblinking, unsleeping—are everywhere.

name: Aether Swooper
oracle_text: Flying
When Aether Swooper enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
Whenever Aether Swooper attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

name: Aethertide Whale
oracle_text: Flying
When Aethertide Whale enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E} (six energy counters).
Pay {E}{E}{E}{E}: Return Aethertide Whale to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"To survive up here, I've learned when to use my harpoon and when to just enjoy the view."
—Kadhu, skywhaler

name: Baral, Chief of Compliance
oracle_text: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Whenever a spell or ability you control counters a spell, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
flavor_text: "The echo of silence is music to my ears."

name: Baral's Expertise
oracle_text: Return up to three target artifacts and/or creatures to their owners' hands.
You may cast a card with converted mana cost 4 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.
flavor_text: "Get out of my way."

name: Bastion Inventor
oracle_text: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text: "This armor transcends the limitations of mere flesh and bone."

name: Disallow
oracle_text: Counter target spell, activated ability, or triggered ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)
flavor_text:
"How easily your flames are quenched."
—Baral, Chief of Compliance

name: Dispersal Technician
oracle_text: When Dispersal Technician enters the battlefield, you may return target artifact to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: As renegade forces closed in on the Aether Spire, Consulate blockades failed one by one.

name: Efficient Construction
oracle_text: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.
flavor_text: For some of Ghirapur's aerowrights, building thopters is a byproduct of larger construction efforts.

name: Hinterland Drake
oracle_text: Flying
Hinterland Drake can't block artifact creatures.
flavor_text:
"As a kid, I dreamed of flying on those wild drakes. They inspired me to build wings of my own."
—Nadja Cloudtoucher, aerowright

name: Ice Over
oracle_text: Enchant artifact or creature
Enchanted permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
flavor_text:
"Slow the Consulate with whatever you've got!"
—Jasi Ganin, master siphoner

name: Illusionist's Stratagem
oracle_text: Exile up to two target creatures you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"When everything hangs on a single moment, be sure you choose the right moment."
—Jace Beleren

name: Leave in the Dust
oracle_text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: The daredevil racers of the Derby Crows, long at odds with the Consulate, were quick to join the renegades in open revolt.

name: Mechanized Production
oracle_text: Enchant artifact you control
At the beginning of your upkeep, create a token that's a copy of enchanted artifact. Then if you control eight or more artifacts with the same name as one another, you win the game.
flavor_text:
"Give me eight walkers, I'll give you the city."
—Dovin Baan

name: Metallic Rebuke
oracle_text: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
flavor_text:
"Too little, too late. The machine is in motion."
—Tezzeret

name: Negate
oracle_text: Counter target noncreature spell.
flavor_text:
"It is fascinating to see how the people of this plane replicate magical techniques without a natural gift. Also frustrating."
—Jace Beleren

name: Quicksmith Spy
oracle_text: When Quicksmith Spy enters the battlefield, target artifact you control gains "{T}: Draw a card" for as long as you control Quicksmith Spy.
flavor_text: "Let's just broaden its surveillance lens."

name: Reverse Engineer
oracle_text: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)
Draw three cards.
flavor_text: The Hold, an illegal research facility in a derelict merchant ship, became a wellspring of renegade intelligence.

name: Salvage Scuttler
oracle_text: Whenever Salvage Scuttler attacks, return an artifact you control to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: A hermit crab goes through many shells in its lifetime, and not all are natural in origin.

name: Shielded Aether Thief
oracle_text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Whenever Shielded Aether Thief blocks, you get {E} (an energy counter).
{T}, Pay {E}{E}{E}: Draw a card.
flavor_text: Conflict breeds opportunity.

name: Shipwreck Moray
oracle_text: When Shipwreck Moray enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E}{E}{E} (four energy counters).
Pay {E}: Shipwreck Moray gets +2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Shipwrecks do wonders for the local fauna, providing both shelter and aether.

name: Skyship Plunderer
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Skyship Plunderer deals combat damage to a player, for each kind of counter on target permanent or player, give that permanent or player another counter of that kind.
flavor_text: Escapes should always be daring.

name: Take into Custody
oracle_text: Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
flavor_text: "You can tell me what I want to know, or you can talk to the Chief of Compliance. Why don't you make it easy on yourself?"

name: Trophy Mage
oracle_text: When Trophy Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 3, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: "The tools of the past will help us forge the future."

name: Whir of Invention
oracle_text: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)
Search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

name: Wind-Kin Raiders
oracle_text: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)
Flying
flavor_text: Small aeronaut societies like the Wind-Kin had little to lose by siding with the renegades, and much to gain.

name: Aether Poisoner
oracle_text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
When Aether Poisoner enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
Whenever Aether Poisoner attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

name: Alley Strangler
oracle_text: Menace
flavor_text: "You never know what day might be your last."

name: Battle at the Bridge
oracle_text: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)
Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn. You gain X life.
flavor_text:
"This is bigger than you. All of you."
—Tezzeret

name: Cruel Finality
oracle_text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor_text: Bitter the bite of a demon's steel, and deep the abyss it opens.

name: Daring Demolition
oracle_text: Destroy target creature or Vehicle.
flavor_text: Living so close to death gives the aetherborn an unusual perspective on risk.

name: Defiant Salvager
oracle_text: Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Defiant Salvager. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
flavor_text: "I didn't survive that crash just so I could fall to the likes of you."

name: Fatal Push
oracle_text: Destroy target creature if it has converted mana cost 2 or less.
Revolt — Destroy that creature if it has converted mana cost 4 or less instead if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.

name: Fen Hauler
oracle_text: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)
Fen Hauler can't be blocked by artifact creatures.
flavor_text:
"Success is found where others fear to look."
—Ara, renegade smuggler

name: Foundry Hornet
oracle_text: Flying
When Foundry Hornet enters the battlefield, if you control a creature with a +1/+1 counter on it, creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Its buzzing is easily mistaken for the hum of a thopter's wings.

name: Fourth Bridge Prowler
oracle_text: When Fourth Bridge Prowler enters the battlefield, you may have target creature get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Renegades run the gamut from lofty sages to petty thieves.

name: Gifted Aetherborn
oracle_text: Deathtouch, lifelink
flavor_text: A few aetherborn have discovered a way to sustain their own existences at the cost of an insatiable hunger for the life essence of other beings.

name: Glint-Sleeve Siphoner
oracle_text: Menace
Whenever Glint-Sleeve Siphoner enters the battlefield or attacks, you get {E} (an energy counter).
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

name: Gonti's Machinations
oracle_text: Whenever you lose life for the first time each turn, you get {E}. (You get an energy counter. Damage causes loss of life.)
Pay {E}{E}, Sacrifice Gonti's Machinations: Each opponent loses 3 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
flavor_text: "I am confident that all our enterprises can benefit from this little revolution."

name: Herald of Anguish
oracle_text: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)
Flying
At the beginning of your end step, each opponent discards a card.
{1}{B}, Sacrifice an artifact: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

name: Ironclad Revolutionary
oracle_text: When Ironclad Revolutionary enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, put two +1/+1 counters on Ironclad Revolutionary and each opponent loses 2 life.
flavor_text: As the rebellion spread, renegade ingenuity outpaced the Consulate's greatest fears.

name: Midnight Entourage
oracle_text: Other Aetherborn you control get +1/+1.
Whenever Midnight Entourage or another Aetherborn you control dies, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

name: Night Market Aeronaut
oracle_text: Flying
Revolt — Night Market Aeronaut enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.
flavor_text: "Death might come tomorrow, but today—today I am alive."

name: Perilous Predicament
oracle_text: Each opponent sacrifices an artifact creature and a nonartifact creature.
flavor_text: Comrades in life. Comrades in death.

name: Renegade's Getaway
oracle_text: Target permanent gains indestructible until end of turn. Create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token. (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy a permanent with indestructible, and if it's a creature, it can't be destroyed by damage.)
flavor_text: You can't fight what you can't find.

name: Resourceful Return
oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If you control an artifact, draw a card.
flavor_text: When the salvage team brought in the shattered gearhulk, a wave of excitement swept through the renegade foundry.

name: Secret Salvage
oracle_text: Exile target nonland card from your graveyard. Search your library for any number of cards with the same name as that card, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: There is no shortage of illegal salvage in Ghirapur, nor of those who are willing to profit from it.

name: Sly Requisitioner
oracle_text: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)
Whenever a nontoken artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

name: Vengeful Rebel
oracle_text: Revolt — When Vengeful Rebel enters the battlefield, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, target creature an opponent controls gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Some aetherborn joined the rebellion for profit, others for the sake of their freedom, still others for revenge.

name: Yahenni, Undying Partisan
oracle_text: Haste
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Yahenni, Undying Partisan.
Sacrifice another creature: Yahenni gains indestructible until end of turn.
flavor_text: "The time for subtlety is over, darling."

name: Yahenni's Expertise
oracle_text: All creatures get -3/-3 until end of turn.
You may cast a card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.
flavor_text: "The Consulate pushed me to my limit, darling, and this is the result."

name: Aether Chaser
oracle_text: First strike
When Aether Chaser enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
Whenever Aether Chaser attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

name: Chandra's Revolution
oracle_text: Chandra's Revolution deals 4 damage to target creature. Tap target land. That land doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
flavor_text: Chandra was driven by her anger, directed particularly at the man who had taken her father from her.

name: Destructive Tampering
oracle_text: Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Creatures without flying can't block this turn.
flavor_text:
"I don't think they'll appreciate my . . . adjustments."
—Karavin, renegade saboteur

name: Embraal Gear-Smasher
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Embraal Gear-Smasher deals 2 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text: "A well-made wrench is a versatile, indispensable tool."

name: Enraged Giant
oracle_text: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)
Trample, haste
flavor_text: When fighting spilled over into Giant's Walk, the aether weapons and swooping airships angered the normally placid creatures.

name: Freejam Regent
oracle_text: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)
Flying
{1}{R}: Freejam Regent gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The dragons perching in Freejam's towers symbolize the zone's fierce independence.

name: Frontline Rebel
oracle_text: Frontline Rebel attacks each combat if able.
flavor_text: "Will you be strong and stand with me?"

name: Gremlin Infestation
oracle_text: Enchant artifact
At the beginning of your end step, Gremlin Infestation deals 2 damage to enchanted artifact's controller.
When enchanted artifact is put into a graveyard, create a 2/2 red Gremlin creature token.

name: Hungry Flames
oracle_text: Hungry Flames deals 3 damage to target creature and 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: In the hold of the Heart of Kiran, Chandra answered Dovin Baan's sabotage with an explosive retort.

name: Indomitable Creativity
oracle_text: Destroy X target artifacts and/or creatures. For each permanent destroyed this way, its controller reveals cards from the top of their library until an artifact or creature card is revealed and exiles that card. Those players put the exiled cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle their libraries.

name: Invigorated Rampage
oracle_text: Choose one —
• Target creature gets +4/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.
• Two target creatures each get +2/+0 and gain trample until end of turn.
flavor_text: Gremlins can change from pest to problem to plague in the span of a moment.

name: Kari Zev, Skyship Raider
oracle_text: First strike, menace
Whenever Kari Zev, Skyship Raider attacks, create a legendary 2/1 red Monkey creature token named Ragavan that's tapped and attacking. Exile that token at end of combat.
flavor_text: Aboard her ship, the Dragon's Smile, Kari follows no one's rules but her own.

name: Kari Zev's Expertise
oracle_text: Gain control of target creature or Vehicle until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.
You may cast a card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.
flavor_text: "I was made for this!"

name: Lathnu Sailback
flavor_text: Travelers to Lathnu, high on the Devra Cliffs, need not fear the political strife of Ghirapur . . . but they have other dangers to worry about.

name: Lightning Runner
oracle_text: Double strike, haste

Whenever Lightning Runner attacks, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters), then you may pay {E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}. If you pay, untap all creatures you control, and after this phase, there is an additional combat phase.
flavor_text: "Catch me if you can."

name: Pia's Revolution
oracle_text: Whenever a nontoken artifact is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return that card to your hand unless target opponent has Pia's Revolution deal 3 damage to them.
flavor_text: Pia's passion was directed at the big picture—at making real, lasting change.

name: Precise Strike
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Hit where it hurts, and always hit first."

name: Quicksmith Rebel
oracle_text: When Quicksmith Rebel enters the battlefield, target artifact you control gains "{T}: This artifact deals 2 damage to any target" for as long as you control Quicksmith Rebel.
flavor_text: "Let's add just a bit more stopping power."

name: Ravenous Intruder
oracle_text: Sacrifice an artifact: Ravenous Intruder gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"I've made some fine acquisitions of late, so I'm planning to make commensurate improvements to my security systems. I have a consultant coming tomorrow."
—Kurna Majan, Luminary League

name: Reckless Racer
oracle_text: First strike
Whenever Reckless Racer becomes tapped, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
flavor_text: Illegal street races turned out to be perfect practice for avoiding Consulate patrols.

name: Release the Gremlins
oracle_text: Destroy X target artifacts. Create X 2/2 red Gremlin creature tokens.
flavor_text:
"Being an inventor means knowing how to use the tools at hand to make something great—or to bring it down."
—Pia Nalaar

name: Scrapper Champion
oracle_text: Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
When Scrapper Champion enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
Whenever Scrapper Champion attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

name: Shock
oracle_text: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text: The tools of invention became the weapons of revolution.

name: Siege Modification
oracle_text: Enchant creature or Vehicle
As long as enchanted permanent is a Vehicle, it's a creature in addition to its other types.
Enchanted creature gets +3/+0 and has first strike.
flavor_text: Perfect for getting through to the consuls.

name: Sweatworks Brawler
oracle_text: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)
Menace
flavor_text: The residents of Embraal were never known for finesse, just for getting things done.

name: Wrangle
oracle_text: Gain control of target creature with power 4 or less until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: Gremlins are loyal to nothing but their next meal.

name: Aether Herder
oracle_text: When Aether Herder enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
Whenever Aether Herder attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

name: Aetherstream Leopard
oracle_text: Trample
When Aetherstream Leopard enters the battlefield, you get {E} (an energy counter).
Whenever Aetherstream Leopard attacks, you may pay {E}. If you do, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

name: Aetherwind Basker
oracle_text: Trample
Whenever Aetherwind Basker enters the battlefield or attacks, you get {E} (an energy counter) for each creature you control.
Pay {E}: Aetherwind Basker gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Its frill inspired the design of efficient aether collectors.

name: Aid from the Cowl
oracle_text: Revolt — At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a permanent card, you may put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, you may put it on the bottom of your library.

name: Druid of the Cowl
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavor_text: "The wild tangle of the Cowl provides sanctuary to life that watched the first buildings rise."

name: Greenbelt Rampager
oracle_text: When Greenbelt Rampager enters the battlefield, pay {E}{E} (two energy counters). If you can't, return Greenbelt Rampager to its owner's hand and you get {E}.
flavor_text: Subtlety is not a necessary part of sabotage.

name: Greenwheel Liberator
oracle_text: Revolt — Greenwheel Liberator enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.
flavor_text: "I will not rest until every vestige of the Consulate—every banner, flag, and standard—has fallen."

name: Heroic Intervention
oracle_text: Permanents you control gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Wherever the strong would harm the weak, I will be there."
—Ajani Goldmane

name: Hidden Herbalists
oracle_text: Revolt — When Hidden Herbalists enters the battlefield, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, add {G}{G}.
flavor_text: In the cellars beneath Narnam House, a strange and deadly garden grows.

name: Highspire Infusion
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. You get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
flavor_text:
"If nothing else, the Inventors' Fair taught us that we're only beginning to discover aether's true potential."
—Kershan Danil, Highspire artisan

name: Lifecraft Awakening
oracle_text: Put X +1/+1 counters on target artifact you control. If it isn't a creature or Vehicle, it becomes a 0/0 Construct artifact creature.
flavor_text: "It was made, yes, but that does not mean it cannot grow."

name: Lifecraft Cavalry
oracle_text: Trample
Revolt — Lifecraft Cavalry enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.
flavor_text:
"I do not ask you to be tame. I only ask you to be true."
—Rishkar, Peema renegade

name: Lifecrafter's Gift
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature, then put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text: The best engineers recognize when a problem has already been solved.

name: Maulfist Revolutionary
oracle_text: Trample
When Maulfist Revolutionary enters the battlefield or dies, for each kind of counter on target permanent or player, give that permanent or player another counter of that kind.

name: Monstrous Onslaught
oracle_text: Monstrous Onslaught deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control as you cast this spell.
flavor_text:
"Regards from Peema."
—Rishkar

name: Narnam Renegade
oracle_text: Deathtouch
Revolt — Narnam Renegade enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.
flavor_text: "I do not need to pierce your heart to still its beating."

name: Natural Obsolescence
oracle_text: Put target artifact on the bottom of its owner's library.
flavor_text:
"It is folly to believe your precious inventions will endure. All things return to the soil."
—Nirav, Tirahar elder

name: Peema Aether-Seer
oracle_text: When Peema Aether-Seer enters the battlefield, you get an amount of {E} (energy counters) equal to the greatest power among creatures you control.
Pay {E}{E}{E}: Target creature blocks this turn if able.
flavor_text: "The Great Conduit connects us all."

name: Prey Upon
oracle_text: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor_text: It is the nature of the strong to survive.

name: Ridgescale Tusker
oracle_text: When Ridgescale Tusker enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.
flavor_text:
"Each creature holds a solution to a problem, a lesson to be learned."
—Oviya Pashiri, sage lifecrafter

name: Rishkar, Peema Renegade
oracle_text: When Rishkar, Peema Renegade enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.
Each creature you control with a counter on it has "{T}: Add {G}."
flavor_text: "Aether is the soul of Kaladesh, and all souls should be free."

name: Rishkar's Expertise
oracle_text: Draw cards equal to the greatest power among creatures you control.
You may cast a card with converted mana cost 5 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.
flavor_text: "Control the Great Conduit? You might as well try to divert a river with your hands."

name: Scrounging Bandar
oracle_text: Scrounging Bandar enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may move any number of +1/+1 counters from Scrounging Bandar onto another target creature.
flavor_text: "It was right here a second ago . . ."

name: Silkweaver Elite
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Revolt — When Silkweaver Elite enters the battlefield, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, draw a card.
flavor_text: Elvish weavers use spidersilk to make everything from tapestries to rappelling ropes.

name: Unbridled Growth
oracle_text: Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
Sacrifice Unbridled Growth: Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"If the Consulate has abandoned restraint, so too shall the wilds."
—Surash, keeper of the Cowl

name: Ajani Unyielding
oracle_text: +2: Reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all nonland permanent cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
−2: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.
−9: Put five +1/+1 counters on each creature you control and five loyalty counters on each other planeswalker you control.

name: Dark Intimations
oracle_text: Each opponent sacrifices a creature or planeswalker, then discards a card. You return a creature or planeswalker card from your graveyard to your hand, then draw a card.
When you cast a Bolas planeswalker spell, exile Dark Intimations from your graveyard. That planeswalker enters the battlefield with an additional loyalty counter on it.

name: Hidden Stockpile
oracle_text: Revolt — At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.
{1}, Sacrifice a creature: Scry 1.

name: Maverick Thopterist
oracle_text: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)
When Maverick Thopterist enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying.

name: Oath of Ajani
oracle_text: When Oath of Ajani enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
Planeswalker spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavor_text: "Until all have found their place, I will keep watch."

name: Outland Boar
oracle_text: Outland Boar can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
flavor_text: The vibrant forest of Peema is awash with aether. Its animals are stronger, faster, and more aggressive than their counterparts elsewhere.

name: Renegade Rallier
oracle_text: Revolt — When Renegade Rallier enters the battlefield, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, return target permanent card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text: "This fight belongs to us all."

name: Renegade Wheelsmith
oracle_text: Whenever Renegade Wheelsmith becomes tapped, target creature can't block this turn.
flavor_text: Many veterans of the Ovalchase racetrack turned their talents to the renegade cause.

name: Rogue Refiner
oracle_text: When Rogue Refiner enters the battlefield, draw a card and you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
flavor_text: "It's natural, it's all around us, and it's there for the taking. Just try and tell me what I'm doing is wrong."

name: Spire Patrol
oracle_text: Flying
When Spire Patrol enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
flavor_text: "After I examine your cargo and check your papers, you can be on your way."

name: Tezzeret the Schemer
oracle_text: +1: Create a colorless artifact token named Etherium Cell with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."
−2: Target creature gets +X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of artifacts you control.
−7: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of combat on your turn, target artifact you control becomes an artifact creature with base power and toughness 5/5."

name: Tezzeret's Touch
oracle_text: Enchant artifact
Enchanted artifact is a creature with base power and toughness 5/5 in addition to its other types.
When enchanted artifact is put into a graveyard, return that card to its owner's hand.

name: Weldfast Engineer
oracle_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, target artifact creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Let's err on the side of glorious mayhem."

name: Winding Constrictor
oracle_text: If one or more counters would be put on an artifact or creature you control, that many plus one of each of those kinds of counters are put on that permanent instead.
If you would get one or more counters, you get that many plus one of each of those kinds of counters instead.

name: Aegis Automaton
oracle_text: {4}{W}: Return another target creature you control to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: The streets of Ghirapur have become dangerous. It's good to have a dependable companion.

name: Aethersphere Harvester
oracle_text: Flying
When Aethersphere Harvester enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
Pay {E}: Aethersphere Harvester gains lifelink until end of turn.
Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

name: Augmenting Automaton
oracle_text: {1}{B}: Augmenting Automaton gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: When you have taught an automaton how to build others of its kind, it is a small step to make it build itself.

name: Barricade Breaker
oracle_text: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)
Barricade Breaker attacks each combat if able.
flavor_text:
"The Consulate sought to crush us. Let's give them a taste of their own medicine."
—Venkat Dasai, renegade commander

name: Cogwork Assembler
oracle_text: {7}: Create a token that's a copy of target artifact. That token gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor_text: Duplication is neither thievery nor flattery. It is efficiency.

name: Consulate Dreadnought
oracle_text: Crew 6 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 6 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)
flavor_text:
"It's like they planted another Bastion right in the middle of the harbor."
—Bes Tavani, Bomat merchant

name: Consulate Turret
oracle_text: {T}: You get {E} (an energy counter).
{T}, Pay {E}{E}{E}: Consulate Turret deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text:
"Our watchtowers are well positioned. Why don't we arm them?"
—Enforcer-Chief Ranaj

name: Crackdown Construct
oracle_text: Whenever you activate an ability of an artifact or creature that isn't a mana ability, Crackdown Construct gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"All buildings are subject to search. Resistance will be punished."
—Enforcer-Chief Ranaj

name: Daredevil Dragster
oracle_text: At end of combat, if Daredevil Dragster attacked or blocked this combat, put a velocity counter on it. Then if it has two or more velocity counters on it, sacrifice it and draw two cards.
Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

name: Filigree Crawler
oracle_text: When Filigree Crawler dies, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.
flavor_text:
"The most harmonious designs are based on relationships found in nature."
—Venand Kapur, the Gearherder

name: Foundry Assembler
oracle_text: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)
flavor_text:
"They never tire, they never complain, and they never ask questions. Build more."
—Ivash, Consulate inventor

name: Gonti's Aether Heart
oracle_text: Whenever Gonti's Aether Heart or another artifact enters the battlefield under your control, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
Pay {E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}, Exile Gonti's Aether Heart: Take an extra turn after this one.
flavor_text: Despite the magic that sustains Gonti's life, the crime lord is often described as heartless.

name: Heart of Kiran
oracle_text: Flying, vigilance
Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)
You may remove a loyalty counter from a planeswalker you control rather than pay Heart of Kiran's crew cost.

name: Hope of Ghirapur
oracle_text: Flying
Sacrifice Hope of Ghirapur: Until your next turn, target player who was dealt combat damage by Hope of Ghirapur this turn can't cast noncreature spells.
flavor_text: The renegades mounted an aether disruptor aboard a lightweight thopter to destroy Tezzeret's Planar Bridge.

name: Implement of Combustion
oracle_text: {R}, Sacrifice Implement of Combustion: It deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
When Implement of Combustion is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text: A dream of fire lies coiled inside, waiting for its glorious awakening.

name: Implement of Examination
oracle_text: {U}, Sacrifice Implement of Examination: Draw a card.
When Implement of Examination is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text: A tool to see the unseen.

name: Implement of Ferocity
oracle_text: {G}, Sacrifice Implement of Ferocity: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
When Implement of Ferocity is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

name: Implement of Improvement
oracle_text: {W}, Sacrifice Implement of Improvement: You gain 2 life.
When Implement of Improvement is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text: A mystery in metal.

name: Implement of Malice
oracle_text: {B}, Sacrifice Implement of Malice: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
When Implement of Malice is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

name: Inspiring Statuary
oracle_text: Nonartifact spells you cast have improvise. (Your artifacts can help cast those spells. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)
flavor_text: Ghirapur's most celebrated inventors have been immortalized in clockwork.

name: Irontread Crusher
oracle_text: Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)
flavor_text: "We've been through a lot together."

name: Lifecrafter's Bestiary
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, scry 1.
Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may pay {G}. If you do, draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Inspiration is found by looking outward."
—Oviya Pashiri, sage lifecrafter

name: Merchant's Dockhand
oracle_text: {3}{U}, {T}, Tap X untapped artifacts you control: Look at the top X cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor_text:
"If you can build it, we can move it."
—Bes Tavani, Bomat merchant

name: Metallic Mimic
oracle_text: As Metallic Mimic enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Metallic Mimic is the chosen type in addition to its other types.
Each other creature you control of the chosen type enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

name: Mobile Garrison
oracle_text: Whenever Mobile Garrison attacks, untap another target artifact or creature you control.
Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

name: Night Market Guard
oracle_text: Night Market Guard can block an additional creature each combat.
flavor_text:
"One head watches for Consulate enforcers. The other watches for renegade thieves."
—Crime Lord Gonti

name: Ornithopter
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"You want to know what we are fighting for? Look at the wonder in that child's eyes."
—Pia Nalaar

name: Pacification Array
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Tap target artifact or creature.
flavor_text: The Consulate had access to thousands of innovative devices displayed at the Inventors' Fair. A few small changes transformed some of them from marvels of ingenuity to instruments of oppression.

name: Paradox Engine
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a spell, untap all nonland permanents you control.
flavor_text:
"One look at this glorious item convinced me that Kaladesh deserved my full attention. Sure enough, my time here has yielded exquisite fruit."
—Tezzeret

name: Peacewalker Colossus
oracle_text: {1}{W}: Another target Vehicle you control becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.
Crew 4 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)
flavor_text:
"Peace? Its sole purpose is fear."
—Saheeli Rai

name: Planar Bridge
oracle_text: {8}, {T}: Search your library for a permanent card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text:
"It is finished. Now the real work can begin."
—Tezzeret

name: Prizefighter Construct
flavor_text: The Scrappers, an underground group with a passion for automaton brawls, had renegade leanings even before the Consulate's crackdown. It didn't take long for them to lend their best brawlers to the conflict.

name: Renegade Map
oracle_text: Renegade Map enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}, Sacrifice Renegade Map: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: "We have safe houses in every zone, but you'll never find one without this."

name: Reservoir Walker
oracle_text: When Reservoir Walker enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life and get {E}{E}{E} (three energy counters).
flavor_text: Renegade supply lines are, by necessity, mobile and difficult to disrupt.

name: Scrap Trawler
oracle_text: Whenever Scrap Trawler or another artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return to your hand target artifact card in your graveyard with lesser converted mana cost.

name: Servo Schematic
oracle_text: When Servo Schematic enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.
flavor_text: The Consulate prizes innovation when it is dependable and replicable.

name: Treasure Keeper
oracle_text: When Treasure Keeper dies, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card with converted mana cost 3 or less. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Put all revealed cards not cast this way on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Universal Solvent
oracle_text: {7}, {T}, Sacrifice Universal Solvent: Destroy target permanent.
flavor_text:
"A few drops of this, and the trickiest problems simply melt away."
—Thamaz, Weldfast inventor

name: Untethered Express
oracle_text: Trample
Whenever Untethered Express attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)
flavor_text: Rules and rails are made to be broken.

name: Verdant Automaton
oracle_text: {3}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Verdant Automaton.
flavor_text:
"A perfect fusion of nature and artifice."
—Irsi, Kujar gardener

name: Walking Ballista
oracle_text: Walking Ballista enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
{4}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Walking Ballista.
Remove a +1/+1 counter from Walking Ballista: It deals 1 damage to any target.

name: Watchful Automaton
oracle_text: {2}{U}: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor_text:
"Before we can destroy our enemies, we must find them. We must peer into every wretched hovel and every teeming market."
—Baral, Chief of Compliance

name: Welder Automaton
oracle_text: {3}{R}: Welder Automaton deals 1 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text: Most of the constructs the renegades used against the Consulate weren't originally intended for combat. But some didn't require much modification.

name: Spire of Industry
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color. Activate this ability only if you control an artifact.
flavor_text: A beacon of prosperity to some, a shadow of oppression to others.

name: Ajani, Valiant Protector
oracle_text: +2: Put two +1/+1 counters on up to one target creature.
+1: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
−11: Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature, where X is your life total. That creature gains trample until end of turn.

name: Inspiring Roar
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
flavor_text:
"This is about more than aether or inventions. Tezzeret's schemes must be stopped!"
—Ajani Goldmane

name: Ajani's Comrade
oracle_text: Trample
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control an Ajani planeswalker, put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Comrade.
flavor_text: "I will go where the lion-man leads."

name: Ajani's Aid
oracle_text: When Ajani's Aid enters the battlefield, you may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Ajani, Valiant Protector, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.
Sacrifice Ajani's Aid: Prevent all combat damage a creature of your choice would deal this turn.

name: Tranquil Expanse
oracle_text: Tranquil Expanse enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.
flavor_text: Beyond the chaos of Ghirapur lies a vibrant world where aether flows through nature.

name: Tezzeret, Master of Metal
oracle_text: +1: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal an artifact card. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
−3: Target opponent loses life equal to the number of artifacts you control.
−8: Gain control of all artifacts and creatures target opponent controls.

name: Tezzeret's Betrayal
oracle_text: Destroy target creature. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Tezzeret, Master of Metal, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.
flavor_text:
"You can't hope to comprehend the plans that are in motion."
—Tezzeret

name: Pendulum of Patterns
oracle_text: When Pendulum of Patterns enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
{5}, {T}, Sacrifice Pendulum of Patterns: Draw a card.
flavor_text: Its elaborate designs reveal secrets of aether's flow.

name: Tezzeret's Simulacrum
oracle_text: {T}: Target opponent loses 1 life. If you control a Tezzeret planeswalker, that player loses 3 life instead.
flavor_text: Tezzeret's command of living metal has nothing to do with intricate gearcraft or aether supplies.

name: Submerged Boneyard
oracle_text: Submerged Boneyard enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.
flavor_text: Aether currents in the sky mirror water currents below, including the deadly rapids.
